explains: n. （用于防洪、防爆等的）沙袋
v. 用沙袋封堵；用沙袋打；粗暴对待，胁迫；（比赛中）故意表现不佳

sentences.en: Farmers in Phichit Province, among others, fought over the maintenance of sandbag barriers and sluice gates.
sentences.cn: 菲吉特省的农民等人为维护沙袋屏障和闸门进行了斗争。

sentences.en: Carry the sandbag on the designated route.
sentences.cn: 在指定的线路上搬运沙袋。

sentences.en: Try sandbag training to build even more strength and endurance.
sentences.cn: 试试沙袋吧，沙袋对于改善体力增加耐力的帮助更大。
